thread.title: Trump May Not Meet With North Korean Leader Until June

author: Michael C. Bender
title: Trump May Not Meet With North Korean Leader Until June
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump on Monday extended the timetable for his anticipated meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, saying the summit might not happen until early June.
“We’ll be meeting with them sometime in May, or early June,” Mr. Trump said at the start of a cabinet meeting.
The president told his White House team in March... RELATED VIDEO What Could Go Wrong at a Trump-Kim Summit? A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable.
